description:
Clip limiter for absolute hard-clipping protection at amplifier output.

# Internal Type Used in preset processing layer only. Not available in user or array layers. Path: `/audio/output/speaker/1/preset/clip_limiter`

# Purpose Final safety stage before amplifier output. Prevents signal from exceeding maximum voltage that would cause hard clipping distortion in power amp.

# Modes - **Normal**: Standard soft clipping - **Soft**: More gradual clipping curve (less harsh)

# Structure - `bypass`: Enable/disable limiter - `mode`: Clipping mode (Normal or Soft)

# Factory Defaults - Mode: Normal - Bypass: false (always active in factory presets)

mode.description: Clipping mode: Normal (standard) or Soft (gradual curve)

title: ClipLimiter
